articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - In their first appearance before Congress since Trump supporters stormed the U.S. Capitol, the chief executives of Facebook, Google and Twitter were asked by U.S. lawmakers whe… [+3732 chars]

articles.title: Finnair Intends To Acquire 19-Seat Electric Aircraft - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: Finnair has signed a Letter of Interest to acquire 20 electric aircraft by 2026, each of which can seat 19 passengers.

articles.title: Ford loses Supreme Court decision, state claims can go forward - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Ford argued it shouldn't be sued in state courts for claims on vehicles neither manufactured nor sold in those states.

articles.title: Trump's former Covid vaccine chief Moncef Slaoui leaves more companies after sexual harassment claim - CNBC
articles.description: Centessa Pharmaceuticals and vaccine developer Vaxcyte announced that Moncef Slaoui has stepped down from his roles with their companies.

articles.author: Lucia Mutikani
articles.title: U.S. weekly jobless claims fall; fourth-quarter growth revised up - Reuters
articles.description: The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits dropped to a one-year low last week, providing a powerful boost to an economy on the verge of stronger growth as the public health situation improves and temperatures rise.
